page.title: 10The Pub,shop and farm cont.
page.content: The Shop Jack has been married for nine years and has had the shop for three years.The shop was built six years ago.Jack enjoys working in the shop and he makes a good profit.The shop has never been broken into.Jack has one brother and one sister who sometimes run the shop for him.Jack said he preferrs it in India but he said that the people of Folksworth are kind. The Farm Mr. Castle's farm is very big.He has got 200 acres.He has got lots of tractors and trailers.He has got one big combine and a very old one from the First World War.He has got lots of animals like horses,sheep,ducks,geese and rabbits.Mr.Castle's farm is a mixed farm.As well as animals he grows corn and barley.
